name: Crazy Frog Racer 2
description:
Crazy Frog Racer 2 is a racing-arcade game developed by Neko Entertainment. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Turtle Games. On review aggregator Metacritic, Crazy Frog Racer 2 has a score of 29. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Crazy Frog Racer 2 is available on PlayStation 2 and PC.
